name: Incredible Hunter: Destroyed M
description:
Incredible Hunter: Destroyed Monster City is an experienced and sharp shooter. You have been given a task to save a castle which is infected by fearful and deadly monsters. The monsters are horrible and most fierce. They had already taken life of many people. Now it’s your duty to save the people from the most deadly creatures.
Features:
- High Definition Graphics
- Realistic Scary Environment
- Challenging Levels
- Horrible and Deadly Monsters
- Smooth Gameplay
- High Quality Weapon
- Stunning Sound Effects
